channel.title: How do i make a emote with this command

item.title: How do i make a emote with this command
item.dc:creator: @dantotman dantotman
item.description:
@dantotman wrote:

i have resently added this command to my server BUT… i want it to have a emote when u do the command how do i add it???

heres the code

[code]if(command.startsWith(“undead”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
infinityHealth = true;
stillgfx(absY, absX, 453);
sendMessage(“You have become invincible!”);
}

	if(command.startsWith("dead") && playerRights >= 2)
	{
infinityHealth = false;
stillgfx(absY, absX, 453);
sendMessage("You are no longer invincible...");
}[/code]

now how do i add a emote when i do it…

please would be nice if u could show me how its don not just give me the code… but if u dnt have time just give me the code thanks

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a emote with this command
